description: In the heart of the Mediterranean, a series of art thefts have left the local galleries in disarray. As whispers of a notorious thief resurface, you must navigate through the vibrant streets of three cities, piecing together clues hidden in the art world. Each suspect presents a unique story, but only one holds the key to unraveling this mystery. Can you connect the dots before the thief vanishes into the night?

reasoning_chain: Identify the suspect traits from the clues.
Match the traits to the suspects in the database.
Eliminate suspects based on inconsistencies with clues.
Confirm Clara Dubois as the only suspect matching all traits.

solution: Connect the clues about the red-haired sketch artist, her focus on Impressionism, and her presence at the art theft locations to identify Clara Dubois.
